channel.title: github.com on c13u's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in github.com on c13u's Blog

item.title: 02. The Subject
ML Usefulness to a Dev
item.description: Link to Original Video ML Usefulness to a Dev Reduce time spent programming, e.g. manually crafted spellchecker with rules of thumb vs. feeding ML model some examples. How many words are there in English? Is it hard to have a huge set of all the possible words? How do spellcheckers do it? Hunspell is the most popular OSS , and it was being used by Chromium , but on Chromium for Windows, the Windows Spellcheck is used .

item.title: On Socioeconomic Classes
item.description: On the Phenomenon of Bullshit Jobs Capitalism is meant to eliminate bullshit jobs, yet layoffs tend to fall on people making, moving, fixing and maintaining things, but not on the salaried paper pushers that effectively work 15 hours a week. â€‹From a political standpoint, a happy productive population with free time on their hands is mortal to the ruling class. Moreover, work is considered a moral value in itself.
